website_summaries.verdict: Buy Motorola's Moto Z3 if you're looking for a well-priced Android phone on Verizon today, not for the promised 5G upgrade module.
pros: The Moto Z3 is a reliable midranger with magnetic Mod attachments
One mod will make it compatible with upcoming 5G networks for faster data speeds
cons: You can only buy it at Verizon
The 5G Mod won't go on sale for months and we don't know how much it will cost

customer_reviews.title: The updated form can be frustrating, but great phone otherwise
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the battery life now that it is the same as the play. The faster CPU is always nice. The expandable SD Micro slot and 64 GB on board makes this a wonderful device to have for photos, downloads, etc. The fingerprint scanner went from the front to the side. The issue is that every time I picked it up or handled it, I was touching the scanner and inadvertently unlocking it too often. Love the opened up front though, with the swipe actions for back, windows/apps, home, etc. I used that on my Z2 Force, but the new layout makes it easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: A four star out of five
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone, grate performance big display in a moderate size phone body :)
customer_reviews.author: SALEEM K.

customer_reviews.title: I'm going to buy the next one, too
customer_reviews.text: I've had all three of these models. I use multiple mods, daily and enjoy each one. Great phone. Great usability. Bring on the 5G!
customer_reviews.author: Amellm

customer_reviews.title: Z3 phone review
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my son to upgrade his z2 force. The phone works perfect. I am on tmobile so i had to manually set up the access point but i knew how. If on another network you have to set the access point or you be running on the global slow network not lte fast. I have no complaints this is a soild phone and his mods from the z2 work with the z3. Great seller great price.
customer_reviews.author: angela l bolin

customer_reviews.title: Worst experience thus far ...
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the package, there was nothing in the box except for the plug for the charger. No cord, just the plug. AND NO PHONE! Unbelievable. We immediately ordered a replacement. Guess what? It was locked! LOCKED! Terrible experience! I would have given a zero rating if permitted!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone worked well. It was made for Verizon but I am running it with an ATT sim card. It was easy to transfer my files and programs. Did not even need to go to to the ATT office to get it running, just swapped the sim card from my old phone.
customer_reviews.author: Panterakat

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love the Moto z one of my favorite phones I've purchased just about every model
customer_reviews.author: Rex Barker Ledon

customer_reviews.title: Please do not buy just buy this phone straight from Motorola
customer_reviews.text: I got the phone but there was a few things wrong with it. It was locked to Verizon and second it came with 48GB internal hard drive and I was buying 64GB for $480 for that price I could have bought the same thing from Motorola with 64GB for cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cost efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Product in excellent condition, linked to various mods & came unlocked. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: John Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: No I lie on features daughter has it and loves it. Haven't seen it.
customer_reviews.author: wilsondlea

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Won't reconnect after you have been in a dead spot without restarting. Fingerprint quit working and locked me out. Will have to be sent in to resolve. Why have a pin if it won't override the fingerprint.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect phone! Just got it free days ago. High-end materials: glass plus aluminum and a decent battery + hardware. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nik Gordya

customer_reviews.title: Underrated
customer_reviews.text: This phone is underrated. I’ve been using apple for years and after it broke I needed something quick. I like this so much better then my iPhone 8. Screen is bright, very quick processor, finger print processor is quick and effective. The campers is pretty good but not the best. On Verizon you can get this phone for real cheap. It’s very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

product_meta.title: Motorola Moto Z3 MOTXT192917 GSM/CDMA LTE Unlocked Droid Edition 5G Capable - Ceramic Black
product_meta.description: Accelerate your mobile experience with the moto z3, the world's first smartphone that can be upgraded to 5G using moto mods. Talk, text and chat for up to 24 hours with a long-lasting 3000 mAh battery. Immerse yourself using a 6-inch Full HD Super AMOLED display. Take stunning pictures and videos with dual 12 MP depth-sensing smart cameras. Or transform your smartphone using moto mod for projecting movies, recording 360 degree videos and accessing Verizon 5G. Get the most out of your moto z3 with Verizon, the nation's best network.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars26 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
